content:
This PR shouldn't be too hard. It's a bunch of comments and some easy results.
@Kenny Lau @Scott Morrison @Anne Baanen
I will try and look at few of the Witt vector PRs today, but don't expect any nolint sprint from me :)
For Anne or anyone else wanting to look at these PRs: there's a draft of the corresponding paper at http://robertylewis.com/files/witt-vectors.pdf
Hopefully the comments in the PRs basically repeat the paper, but if you're looking for more motivation, it's written down ;)
